gametext: Adds 3 to the power of any capital starship he pilots. Deploys free aboard \ul Home One\ul0 . While piloting a Star Cruiser, adds one battle destiny.  Where you have two Rebel capital starships, attrition against opponent is +2.
lore: Mon Calamari \b leader\b0  of Rebel fleet. Master military strategist. Early prisoner of Grand Moff Tarkin. Convinced his people to join the Alliance.
name: Admiral Ackbar (V)

gametext: May add 2 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. If in battle with another Rebel capital starship, may draw destiny. Subtract that amount from opponent's attrition and total power.
lore: Modified medium transport. Well armored. Has expanded passenger capacity to facilitate evacuation. The last transport to escape Hoth. Nearly destroyed by the \ul Stalker\ul0.
name: Bright Hope (V)

gametext: Once per turn, if you just drew a destiny of 5, may take that card into hand. During any deploy phase, may use 1 Force to target a Dark Jedi present. Draw destiny. If destiny = 5, target loses immunity to attrition for remainder of turn.
lore: Clone trooper and \b spy\b0.
name: CT-5555 (Fives)

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots, 3 if a Rebel capital starship. Deploys -1 aboard \ul Tantive IV\ul0 . While aboard \ul Tantive IV\ul0 , it is immune to Lateral Damage and attrition < 5.
lore: Alderaanian \b Leader. \b0
name: Captain Raymus Antilles
Diplomatic Mission To Alderaan/A Weakness Can Be Found

gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Adds 2 to the hyperspeed of any freighter he pilots. During your move phase, may use 1 Force to "break cover" of opponent's Undercover spy at same site. Lateral Damage is canceled at same or related system.
lore: Duros \b scout\b0  and \b smuggler\b0 .
name: Ellorrs Madak, Pilot Instructor

gametext: Deploys -1 to Endor. During battle, your other Rebels here may not have their forfeit reduced unless this card 'hit.' Each time this character is 'hit,' it is cumulatively power -2 until end of turn.
lore: General Solo's strike team was made up of the Alliance's finest ground troops. Scout trooper.
name: Endor Commando Team

gametext: Adds 1 to the power of anything he pilots. While present with an Imperial (or two Rebels), all immunity to attrition here is canceled.
lore: Padawan.
name: Kanan Jarrus

gametext: Adds 3 to the power of anything he pilots. Smuggler. When piloting a freighter, adds 1 to hyperspeed. Your total ability at same docking bay or system may not be reduced. Once per game, may deploy a card with 'Ellorrs' in title here from reserve deck; reshuffle.
lore: Female Duros. Expert pilot. Helps run the docking facilities in Mos Eisley. Friends with Ellorrs Madak. Approves all cargo manifests. Forgiving of minor transgressions.
name: Leslomy Tacema (V)

gametext: Scout. Deploys free to (and power +2 at) Cantina, Endor, or Hoth. Opponent may not 'react' to or from here. Once per game, may retrieve an Explosive Charge into hand.
lore: Hero of Nentan. Supervised construction of Echo Base on Hoth. Head of base security. At the Mos Eisley Cantina, everyone knows his name.
name: Major Bren Derlin (V)

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of any capital starship he pilots. Your Rebel starships may move to here for free. While piloting a Rebel capital starship, opponent may not modify or cancel your battle destinies here.
lore: Mon Calamari \b leader\b0 .
name: Mon Calamari Admiral

gametext: Cancels Vader's game text here. If with a Skywalker, may add one destiny to attrition. Immune to attrition < 3.
lore: Queen Amidala posed as one of her own handmaidens for added safety as well as to keep an eye on her Jedi protectors. Was to be protected by the Jedi at all times.
name: Padm� Naberrie (V)

gametext: Plays on any site. This location may not be targeted by Proton Bombs. Cancels Program Trap here. Unless Death Star: Docking Bay 327 on table, Commence Primary Ignition is canceled.
lore: Key installations are protected from bombardment by a complex network of early warning sensors, emergency shields and fast response fighters.
name: Planetary Defenses (V)

gametext: If about to leave table from Tatooine system (even from Overwhelmed) and Stolen Data Tapes deployed on this character, may instead be relocated to Dune Sea. Immune to devices. Unless Undercover, immune to opponent's Interrupts.
lore: Stranded in the Dune Sea, R2-D2 insisted on heading into rocky canyons where he thought settlements were likely to exist. Threepio had other ideas.
name: R2-D2 & C-3PO

gametext: Take an admiral or general into hand from reserve deck; reshuffle. OR If your admiral is in battle at a system (or your general is in battle at a site), you may either add one battle destiny or prevent opponent from drawing more than one battle destiny.
lore: In times of greatest need, the Rebellion relies on the brilliant leadership provided by commanders fighting for freedom.
name: Rebel Leadership (V)

gametext: Deploy on Dune Sea or R2-D2. If about to be lost, relocate to Dune Sea (if possible). If at Dune Sea, may relocate to your character here. If at Alderaan (or a 'blown away' system), schematics 'delivered'; relocate this Effect to table and may take into hand any card from reserve deck; reshuffle. [Immune to Alter.]
name: Stolen Data Tapes

gametext: If your Padawan or Skywalker of ability < 6 is in battle with a Dark Jedi, either add one battle destiny or Cancel I Have You Now.
lore: Luke's piloting skills and Force abilities made his X-wing a difficult target for Darth Vader as they raced down the Death Star trench.
name: The Force Is Strong With This One (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. Your scouts move (using landspeed) to and from Back Door for free. Once per turn, may deploy Bunker or an Endor battleground site from reserve deck; reshuffle. While an Explosive Charge at Bunker, flip Rebel Strike Team and Garrison Destroyed may not flip. [Immune to Alter]
lore: Lando's confidence in the Rebel strike team on the forest moon was rewarded, and proved to be a decisive factor at the Battle of Endor.
name: The Shield Is Down! (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. While no card stacked here, may stack opponent's just-played Interrupt here. Opponent may use 3 Force to place an Interrupt here in Used Pile. Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile. [Immune to Alter].
lore: Being sent to dispose of two Jedi is the battle droid equivalent of a really bad day at the office.
name: Thrown Back (V)

gametext: Add 2 to the power of anything she pilots. Your total battle destiny here is +1 (+2 if piloting a transport). Once per turn, if a battle just ended, may 'rescue' (retrieve from Lost Pile OR stack on [Set 0] Evacuation Control) a Rebel of ability < 3 forfeited from same location this turn.
lore: Chief Controller at Echo Command. Responsible for communicating orders to the troops. Personally gives firing orders to Ion Cannon Control.
name: Toryn Farr (V)

gametext: May add 3 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilot provides ability of 2. During battle, your total battle destiny is +1 for each smuggler aboard. Deploys and moves like a starfighter. Immune to attrition < 5.
name: Wild Karrde

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. When deployed, may reveal the top two cards of your Reserve Deck; take one into hand and place the other in Used Pile. While with an ISB agent, adds one battle destiny.
lore: \b ISB leader\b0.
name: Agent Kallus

characteristics: \b Black Sun agent\b0 , duros, \b information broker, scout, smuggler \b0
gametext: Adds 3 to power and 1 to hyperspeed of anything he pilots. Once per turn, if you just deployed a Black Sun Agent to same system, may draw top card of Reserve Deck. Your characters here are immune to Cantina Brawl and Fallen Portal.
lore: Duros \b information broker\b0, \b scout \b0 and \b smuggler \b0.
name: Baniss Keeg, Pilot Instructor

characteristics: \b bounty hunter\b0, Black Sun agent, Duros
gametext: Add 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Your other bounty hunters here are power +1. Draws one battle destiny if unable to otherwise. During battle, if with your other bounty hunter, may cancel the immunity to attrition of a Jedi here.
lore: Duros \b bounty hunter\b0.
name: Cad Bane

gametext: Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Once per game, may deploy an Imperial-class Star Destroyer from reserve deck; reshuffle. While piloting Avenger, it is immune to attrition < 4 and during battle may lose an Imperial aboard (or from hand) to cancel a just drawn destiny (causes a redraw if opponent's first battle destiny).
lore: Logistics officer for the \ul Avenger\ul0, member of the Line Branch of the Imperial Navy. Relays important scanner information to Captain Needa. Fiercely competitive.
name: Commander Nemet (V)

dark_side_text: While you occupy with a Black Sun agent or ISB agent, gains one [Dark Side Force] icon and one [Light Side Force] icon.
gametext: While you occupy with a Black Sun agent or ISB agent, gains one [Dark Side Force] icon and one [Light Side Force] icon.
light_side_text: While you control, gains one [Light Side Force] icon.
name: Coruscant (V)

dark_side_text: Black Sun agents move to here for free. Once per turn, may deploy a Xizor's Palace site form reserve deck; reshuffle
light_side_text: Unless Chewie, Dash, or Leia present, Force drain -1 here.
name: Coruscant: Xizor's Palace

gametext: Cancels the game text of Amidala, Obi-Wan, and Qui-Gon at same site. While alone, Blaster Deflection is canceled here and Maul's weapon destiny draws may not be modified or canceled by opponent. Immune to attrition < 5.
lore: Trade Federation.
name: Darth Maul, Lone Hunter

gametext: Deploy on a capital starship. Starship is power and armor +2 and immune to attrition < 5. May cancel Combined Attack or Power Pivot targeting this starship. Starfighters here may not 'attach'.
lore: Located atop the superstructure of a Star Destroyer, the generator towers create an energy shield which repels solid objects and weapons fire.
name: Deflector Shield Generators (V)

gametext: Deploy on table. While no card stacked here, may stack opponent's just-played Interrupt here. Opponent may use 3 Force to place an Interrupt here in Used Pile. Once per turn, may place a card from hand on bottom of Used Pile.  [Immune to Alter].
lore: Anakin had to heed Qui-Gon's advice to avoid the rapidly approaching storm.
name: Drop! (V)

gametext: Deploys -3 if your Black Sun agent is at a related site. May add 3 pilots and 6 passengers. Permanent pilots provide total ability of 4. Immune to attrition < 8.
name: Falleen's Fist

gametext: Any stolen lightsaber may deploy on Grievous. Once per game, Grievous may steal a lightsaber from opponent's Lost Pile. Unless alone, may lose 1 Force to return Grievous (and your cards on him) to hand from a site you control. Immune to attrition < 4.
lore: Trade Federation.
name: General Grievous

gametext: While at a Jabba's Palace site, your other Gamorreans are deploy -1 and forfeit +3.  Permanent weapon is (*]Ortugg's Ax (may target a character or creature for free; draw destiny; target hit, and its forfeit = 0, if destiny +1 > defense value).
lore: Gamorrean in charge of the Gamorreans at Jabba's palace. Posted to stand guard at the entrance cavern. Assigned by Jabba to keep an eye on Tessek.
name: Ortugg (V)

dark_side_text: Opponent may not initiate battle here until after your first turn.
light_side_text: If a player controls, for each of their starships here, their power is +1 in battles at Tatooine sites.
name: Tatooine (V)

dark_side_text: If Falleen's Fist at Coruscant and your Black Sun agent here, Force drain +1 here. .
gametext: If Falleen's Fist at Coruscant and your Black Sun agent here, Force drain +1 here.
name: Xizor's Palace: Uplink Station
